entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
